entry.summary:
Author: La traductora (Botkabularia)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 323,378Chapters: 21/24Kudos: 48

Summary: Located in a world divided into five houses, where summer can last for years but winter an eternity, and where the magic of the ancient religion is forbidden, there was a war known as "The Magic War," in which King Uther massacred the Emrys family, exiling them from the Iron Throne and proclaiming himself as the sole King of Camelot. Fifteen years later, when King Uther mysteriously dies and his son takes the throne, the world seems to be in chaos.Caerleon, the land of the north, is protected by a giant wall of ice to separate the five houses from the dark forces that dare to be in the Pale Forest, in order to preserve peace.If there was ever peace.With the death of King Uther, the war of the five houses for the Iron Throne seems more heated than ever.And not even the approaching winter can stop it. Puedes leer la versión en español aquí.
